1.name: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
1.description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

2.name: City Lights
2.description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

3.name: Frankenstein
3.description: An obsessed scientist assembles a living being from parts of exhumed corpses.

4.name: Dracula
4.description: The ancient vampire Count Dracula arrives in England and begins to prey upon the virtuous young Mina.

5.name: The Public Enemy
5.description: A young hoodlum rises up through the ranks of the Chicago underworld, even as a gangster's accidental death threatens to spark a bloody mob war.

6.name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
6.description: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.

7.name: Mata Hari
7.description: A semi-fictionalized account of the life of Mata Hari, an exotic dancer who was accused of spying for Germany during World War I.

8.name: Little Caesar
8.description: A small-time criminal moves to a big city to seek bigger fortune.

9.name: Tabu: A Story of the South Seas
9.description: On the South Pacific island of Bora Bora, a young couple's love is threatened when the tribal chief declares the girl a sacred virgin.

10.name: Cimarron
10.description: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

11.name: Pardon Us
11.description: Two guys end up in prison after attempting to sell beer to a policeman during Prohibition.

12.name: Monkey Business
12.description: On a transatlantic crossing, The Marx Brothers get up to their usual antics and manage to annoy just about everyone on board the ship.

13.name: Rich and Strange
13.description: Believing that an unexpected inheritance will bring them happiness, a married couple instead finds their relationship strained to the breaking point.

14.name: Night Nurse
14.description: A nurse enlists the help of a petty criminal to foil a sinister plot to murder two children.

15.name: The Skin Game
15.description: An old traditional family and a modern family battle over land in a small English village and almost destroy each other.

16.name: The Maltese Falcon
16.description: A lovely dame with dangerous lies employs the services of a private detective, who is quickly caught up in the mystery and intrigue of a statuette known as the Maltese Falcon.

17.name: Possessed
17.description: An ambitious factory girl meets a handsome, wealthy lawyer, but he's interested in her as a mistress, not a wife.

18.name: Smart Money
18.description: Immigrant Greek barber has uncommon skills in playing poker and soon rises in the seedy world of illegal gambling, but pretty blondes remain his Achilles' heel.

19.name: Drácula
19.description: Centuries-old vampire Dracula preys upon the innocent Eva and her friends.

20.name: The Champ
20.description: An alcoholic ex-boxer struggles to provide a good living for his son.

21.name: Platinum Blonde
21.description: A young woman from a very rich family impulsively marries a reporter, but each assumes the other is the one whose lifestyle must change.

22.name: A Free Soul
22.description: An alcoholic lawyer who successfully defended a notorious gambler on a murder charge objects when his free-spirited daughter becomes romantically involved with him.

23.name: The Front Page
23.description: An investigative reporter sees an opportunity for the story of a lifetime when an accused murderer escapes hanging.

24.name: The Miracle Woman
24.description: After an unappreciated minister dies, his daughter loses her faith in God, prompting her to open a phony temple with a con man. Can the love of a blind aviator restore her faith and happiness?

25.name: La chienne
25.description: A woman and her pimp exploit a painter for money.

26.name: Waterloo Bridge
26.description: A prostitute's self-loathing makes her reluctant to marry an idealistic soldier during World War One.

27.name: The Finger Points
27.description: Rookie reporter receives bribes from gangsters to suspend negative press.

28.name: Arrowsmith
28.description: Based on Sinclair Lewis's novel "Arrowsmith". A medical researcher is sent to a plague outbreak, where he has to decide priorities for the use of a vaccine.

29.name: Susan Lenox (Her Fall and Rise)
29.description: Fleeing her cruel uncle and an arranged marriage Susan Lenox falls in love with a kind stranger but circumstances force her to become a woman of easy virtue.

30.name: Die 3 Groschen-Oper
30.description: In London at the turn of the century, the bandit Mack the Knife marries Polly without the knowledge of her father, Peachum, the 'king of the beggars'.

31.name: Bad Girl
31.description: A man and woman, skeptical about romance, nonetheless fall in love and are wed, but their lack of confidence in the opposite sex haunts their marriage.

32.name: The Bad Sister
32.description: Marianne falls in love with a con artist who has a hidden agenda.

33.name: Private Lives
33.description: Divorced couple unexpectedly meet each other during their honeymoon and rekindle their love.

34.name: Alexander Hamilton
34.description: With the end of the Revolutionary War in 1783, General George Washington took Colonel Hamilton with him into the newly formed government. While the main disagreements in the early days was ...                See full summary »

35.name: The Smiling Lieutenant
35.description: An amorous lieutenant is forced to marry a socially awkward princess, though he tries to keep his violin-playing girlfriend on the side.

36.name: The Yellow Ticket
36.description: A young Russian girl is forced into a life of prostitution in Czarist Russia, and she and a British journalist find their lives endangered when she reveals to him information regarding the ...                See full summary »

37.name: Blonde Crazy
37.description: The adventures of an egoistic con man and his glamorous accomplice.

38.name: Emil und die Detektive
38.description: Emil goes to Berlin to see his grandmother with a large amount of money and is offered sweets by a strange man that make him sleep. He wakes up at his stop with no money. It is up to him and a group of children to save the day.

39.name: Trader Horn
39.description: Two white traders in the darkest Africa of the 1870s find a missionary's daughter, who was captured as a child by a savage tribe and now worshiped as a goddess.

40.name: Illicit
40.description: A young couple lives together out of wedlock, but they find that they're ahead of their time.

41.name: Skippy
41.description: Skippy, the mischievous son of a wealthy doctor, meets Sooky in poverty-ridden Shantytown, and together they try to save Sooky's pet from a cruel dogcatcher.

42.name: The Black Camel
42.description: The unsolved murder of a Hollywood actor several years earlier and an enigmatic psychic are the keys to help Charlie solve the Honolulu stabbing death of a beautiful actress.

43.name: Ten Cents a Dance
43.description: Men pay a dime to dance with Barbara and her fellow taxi dancers. She marries Eddie and plans to quit dancing. Before she does, she meets a handsome and rich gentleman.

44.name: À nous la liberté
44.description: Seeking better life, two convicts escape from prison.

45.name: An American Tragedy
45.description: A poor factory worker, employed by a wealthy uncle, falls in love with a beautiful heiress but his happiness and promising future are jeopardized by a previous affair with a coworker he impregnated.

46.name: City Streets
46.description: Man joins a gang to free his girlfriend from prison.

47.name: Safe in Hell
47.description: After accidentally killing the man who raped her and forced her into prostitution, a New Orleans woman flees to a Caribbean island. While she awaits her fiancé, the vicious local police chief sets his sights on her.

48.name: Marius
48.description: Marius is faced with a choice whether to fulfill his passion by sailing the seas or stay and marry the woman he loves.

49.name: Street Scene
49.description: Twenty-four hours elapse on the stoop of a Hell's Kitchen tenement as a microcosm of the American melting pot interacts with each other during a summer heatwave.

50.name: Arizona
50.description: Bob refuses to marry his girlfriend and leaves her. She marries his close friend out of revenge.
